prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, Drums, Brass, Bass, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features a combination of Guitar, Piano, Synth Pad, Drums, Brass, and Bass, but no Reed.

Style 3:
